name: Lawn Maintenance
description: Mowing of grass, cleaning up edges, removal of weeds, and fertilization to have your lawn looking good.

name: Trimming Maintance
description: Keep your lawn looking clean. We provide a well trimmed clean look to your bushes, hedges and shrubs.

name: Cleaning & Hauling
description: Clean up and take care of anything that needs to be hauled away or disposed

name: Tree Maintance
description: We help maintain, clean, trim, plant, and/or remove any tree on your lawn.
